edu.umd.cs.psl.model.formula

Class FormulaAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.model.formula.FormulaAnalysis

  • public class FormulaAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts a Formula to a simplified Disjunctive Normal Form view and makes the clauses available.

    Each clause reports properties and helps Kernels with registering for the appropriate AtomEvents and running the appropriate DatabaseQueries to identify true groundings.
